__Consider the power-loglinear recurrence rate given by__
$$
\nu(t;\gamma_{0},\gamma_{1},\gamma_{2},\gamma_{3})=
\frac{\gamma_{3}}{\gamma_{2}} 
\left(\frac{t}{\gamma_{2}}\right)^{\gamma_{3}-1}
\exp(\gamma_{0}+\gamma_{1} t). 
$$

a. __Show that this model includes as special cases the power and the loglinear models.__

a. __Show that under the NHPP model, the mean cumulative number of system events over $(0,t]$ is__
$$
 \mu(t;\gamma_{0},\gamma_{1},\gamma_{2},\gamma_{3}) =
 \gamma_{3}\,\left(\frac{t}{\gamma_{2}}\right)^{\gamma_{3}}
 \exp(\gamma_{0})
 \left[
   \frac{1}{\gamma_{3}} +
   \sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\frac{(\gamma_{1} t)^{i}}{ (\gamma_{3}+i)\times i!}  \right]. 
$$
